metadata.title: CVE-2017-12867 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The SimpleSAML_Auth_TimeLimitedToken class in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.14 and earlier allows attackers with access to a secret token to extend its validity period by manipulating the prepended time offset.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-12867` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
